ch0126_90_haruka/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I thought you’d
show up here!
ch0126_90_haruka/0101_0701_02_10: All right! Time for another day of fieldwork!
ch0126_90_haruka/7101_0701_01_10: I wonder what’s beyond the sea...
ch0126_90_haruka/7101_0701_02_10:
Maybe there are loads of Pokémon we’ve never
even heard of!
ch0126_90_haruka/7101_0701_03_10:
Someday, I’d like to do some fieldwork out there
with Kyogre!
ch0126_90_haruka/7102_0701_01_10:
Kyogre has the power to summon storms that
cause the sea levels to rise.
ch0126_90_haruka/7102_0701_02_10:
Power to control nature like that is on a whole
’nother level!
ch0126_90_haruka/7102_0701_03_10: I’ve gotta give it my all to get that good!
ch0126_90_haruka/7103_0701_01_10: What do you think of my outfit? Cool, right?!
ch0126_90_haruka/7103_0701_02_10: Just wearing it helps me focus!
ch0126_90_haruka/7103_0701_03_10: I might even be able to unleash more power!
ch0126_90_haruka/7104_0701_01_10:
I can’t believe I’m a Neo Champion. It feels like
a dream!
ch0126_90_haruka/7104_0701_03_10:
But I won’t let myself be satisfied! I’m gonna get
even stronger!
ch0126_90_haruka/7105_0701_01_10:
I was able to become a Neo Champion thanks to
everyone I’ve met so far!
ch0126_90_haruka/7105_0701_02_10:
Like my dad, Brendan, Steven...and everyone
else, too.
ch0126_90_haruka/7105_0701_04_10: So I’m gonna do my best to return the favor!
ch0126_90_haruka/1701_0701_01_10: Hey, great timing! This is for you!
ch0126_90_haruka/1701_0702_01_10: Let’s both keep up the good work!
ch0126_90_haruka/2501_0701_01_10:
I often run into Team Aqua when doing fieldwork
by the sea.
ch0126_90_haruka/2501_0701_02_10:
Lately, I’ve been seeing them almost every day,
so they kinda feel like neighbors now!
ch0126_90_haruka/2501_0701_03_10:
Whenever I talk to them, they’re so friendly
and kind!
ch0126_90_haruka/2501_0702_01_10:
We’ve had our ups and downs with Team Aqua...
But now I’m truly cheering for them!
ch0126_90_haruka/2501_0702_02_10:
They may have gone too far before, but I
understand wanting to create a better world!
ch0126_90_haruka/2501_0702_03_10:
And if there’s anything Kyogre and I can do,
we plan to help!
ch0126_90_haruka/2511_0701_01_10:
To be honest, until recently, it felt as if Brendan
had gotten out of reach.
ch0126_90_haruka/2511_0701_02_10:
We shared the same starting point, but I felt
left behind.
ch0126_90_haruka/2511_0701_03_10:
But now that I’m a Neo Champion, I feel like I’ve
caught up!
ch0126_90_haruka/2511_0701_04_10: Eheheh... It almost takes my breath away.
ch0126_90_haruka/2511_0702_01_10:
If I take it too easy, Brendan’ll leave me in the
dust again!
ch0126_90_haruka/2511_0702_02_10:
This time, I’ll take the lead! And I want you to
help me!
ch0126_90_haruka/2511_0702_03_10:
Let’s train in secret to get even better than
Brendan!
ch0126_90_haruka/3001_0701_01_10:
Waking up early is great because it means more
time for playing with Pokémon!
ch0126_90_haruka/3003_0701_01_10:
I can’t believe it’s already lunchtime! Guess I lost 
track of time. Wanna take a little break together?
ch0126_90_haruka/3005_0701_01_10:
There’s something about gazing into the night sky
that just takes your breath away...
